verses.name: Hebrews 6:1
verses.text: Therefore leaving the principles of the doctrine of Christ, let us go on unto perfection; not laying again the foundation of repentance from dead works, and of faith toward God,

verses.name: Hebrews 6:2
verses.text: Of the doctrine of baptisms, and of laying on of hands, and of resurrection of the dead, and of eternal judgment.

verses.name: Hebrews 6:3
verses.text: And this will we do, if God permit.

verses.name: Hebrews 6:4
verses.text: For it is impossible for those who were once enlightened, and have tasted of the heavenly gift, and were made partakers of the Holy Ghost,

verses.name: Hebrews 6:5
verses.text: And have tasted the good word of God, and the powers of the world to come,
